name: Crescent Coast
description:
Made for Husky Jam, a Seaside-Focused 48 Hour Game Jam

You're a crab trying to make it's way back to shore, but the tides keep getting in your way. 

Credits: 

Elle : 2D Assets

Taha : 2D Assets, Videography 

Luke : Programming, 2D Assets

Jordan : Game Design

Alan : Programming 

Noah : Programming, Music
